src:
Golkar Tetapkan Munas 4-6 Desember, Simak Susunan Panitianya
05 Nov 2019, 15:23 by Fikri Arigi, Zacharias Wuragil
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Rapat Pleno Partai Golkar telah menetapkan jadwal Musyawarah Nasional atau Munas Golkar pada 4-6 Desember 2019 mendatang. Munas akan memilih ketua umum partai beringin periode berikutnya.
“Munasnya akan diselenggarakan 4,5,6 Desember bertempat di Jakarta,” ujar Ketua Umum Golkar Airlangga Hartarto, di Kantor DPP Golkar, Selasa 5 November 2019.
Rapat pleno malam ini juga menetapkan susunan penyelenggara Munas. Ketua penyelenggara dipegang Melchias Marcus Mekeng, dengan pengarah (steering committee) Ibnu Munzir dan panitia pelaksana Adies Kadier.
Airlangga mengatakan rapat pleno juga membahas agenda ulang tahun Golkar ke-55 yang jatuh pada Rabu 6 November 2019 di Hotel Sultan. Juga agenda Rapat Pimpinan Nasional Golkar yang akan dilaksanakan pada 14-15 November yang akan mempersiapkan materi-materi untuk munas.
“Tadi juga disepakati khusus untuk Rapimnas, ketua penyelenggara Pak Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita, steering comittee Ibnu Munzir, organizing comittee Heru Dewanto,” kata Airlangga.
Ketua Bidang Pratama Partai Golkar, Bambang Soesatyo, tak nampak di rapat pleno tersebut. Sebelumnya, sejumlah pendukung Airlangga meminta Bamsoet menepati komitmen tak maju di munas Golkar lantaran sudah menjadi ketua MPR RI.
"Mungkin kesepakatan itu ada antara Pak Bambang dan Pak Airlangga. Tentunya kami tunggu saja," ucap Sekretaris Jenderal Golkar, Lodewijk Friedrich Paulus, di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa 5 November 2019.
text:
Golkar Establishes National Conference 4-6 December, See the Arrangement of its Committee
05 Nov 2019, 15:23 by Fikri Arigi, Zacharias Wuragil
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Golkar Party Plenary Meeting has set the schedule for the Golkar National Conference or National Conference on 4-6 December 2019. The National Conference will elect the chairman of the next period of the banyan party.
"The National Conference will be held December 4,5,6 in Jakarta," said Golkar Chairperson Airlangga Hartarto, at the Golkar DPP Office, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
Tonight's plenary meeting also established the composition of the National Conference organizer. The chair of the organizer was held by Melchias Marcus Mekeng, with steering committee Ibnu Munzir and the organizing committee Adies Kadier.
Airlangga said the plenary meeting also discussed the agenda for the 55th anniversary of Golkar which fell on Wednesday 6 November 2019 at the Sultan Hotel. Also the agenda of the Golkar National Leadership Meeting which will be held on November 14-15 will prepare materials for the General Assembly.
"Earlier it was also agreed specifically for Rapimnas, the chairman of the organizer Mr. Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita, steering committee committee Ibnu Munzir, organizing committee committee Heru Dewanto," Airlangga said.
The Golkar Party Primary Chair, Bambang Soesatyo, did not appear at the plenary meeting. Previously, a number of supporters of Airlangga asked Bamsoet to keep their commitments not progressing in the Golkar General Assembly because they had become chairman of the Indonesian MPR.
"Maybe the agreement exists between Mr. Bambang and Mr. Airlangga. Surely we will just wait," said the Secretary General of Golkar, Lodewijk Friedrich Paulus, at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
